{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Fashion design {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Fashion design Fashion design is the art of applying design, aesthetics, clothing construction and natural beauty to clothing and its accessories. It is influenced by cultural and social attitudes, and has varied over time and place. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fashion design)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
